MARK: Okay, got that paw, okay uh.

00:06
COMM: Like millions of people around the world

Mark Dumas loves nothing more than to take
a swim. But for him there is a rather massive
difference as Mark swims with a polar bear.

title: The Only Man In The World Who Can Swim With A Polar Bear: Grizzly Man
